<title>Passenger &#039;dressed as clown&#039; sparks &#039;mass brawl&#039; on cruise ship - Independent.ie</title>
<meta name="keywords" content="independent" />
<meta name="description" content="A passenger dressed as a clown sparked a mass brawl on a P&O cruise ship, according to reports." />
<meta name="news_keywords" content="Passenger &#039;dressed as clown&#039; sparks &#039;mass brawl&#039; on cruise ship - Independent.ie" />
<meta property="og:title" content="Passenger &#039;dressed as clown&#039; sparks &#039;mass brawl&#039; on cruise ship - Independent.ie"/>
<meta property="og:site_name" content="Independent.ie"/>
<meta property="og:description" content="A passenger dressed as a clown sparked a mass brawl on a P&O cruise ship, according to reports."/>
<meta property="og:url" content="https://www.independent.ie/world-news/europe/passenger-dressed-as-clown-sparks-mass-brawl-on-cruise-ship-38352236.html"/>
<meta property="og:type" content="article"/>
<script type="application/ld+json">
{
"@context": "http://schema.org",
"@type": "NewsArticle",
"headline": "Passenger 'dressed as clown' sparks 'mass brawl' on cruise ship",
"inLanguage": "en",
"publisher": {
"@type": "Organization",
"name": "Independent.ie",
"logo": {
"@type": "ImageObject",
"url": "https://www.independent.ie/editorial/images/independent-logo.png"
}
},
"image": {
"@type": "ImageObject",
"url": "https://www.independent.ie/incoming/article38352235.ece/ALTERNATES/h342/POLICE%20Cruise%20.jpg",
"height": "342",
"width": "322"
},
"mainEntityOfPage": {
"@type": "WebPage",
"@id": "https://www.independent.ie/"
},
"dateCreated": "2019-07-28T11:10:25+0100",
"dateModified": "2019-07-28T11:10:26+0100",
"datePublished": "2019-07-28T11:10:26+0100",
"keywords": "independent",
"thumbnailUrl": "https://cdn-03.independent.ie/incoming/article38352235.ece/ALTERNATES/h342/POLICE%20Cruise%20.jpg",
"author": {
"@type": "Person",
"name": "Megan Baynes"
},
"description": "A passenger dressed as a clown sparked a mass brawl on a P&O cruise ship, according to reports.",
"articleBody": "A passenger dressed as a clown sparked a mass brawl on a P&O cruise ship, according to reports. Families fled as passengers allegedly used furniture and plates as weapons onboard the ship, which had left Bergen in Norway just 12 hours earlier. Passengers suspected of being behind the violence were reportedly confined to their cabins on the last day of the cruise, before being greeted by Hampshire police when the ship docked in Southampton on Saturday morning. Chief correspondent for ITV's Good Morning Britain, Richard Gaisford, was on the cruise. He wrote on Twitter: &#34;One witness, part of a group involved in the trouble, explained to staff that things kicked off when another passenger appeared dressed as a clown. &#34;This upset one of their party because they'd specifically booked a cruise with no fancy dress. It led to a violent confrontation.&#34; Staff told Mr Gaisford they had never seen anything like it, and one witness said &#34;there was blood everywhere&#34;. Another passenger said: &#34;I was in my room when the security tannoy happened at 2am. &#34;I saw two people being escorted out by police - police holding their belongings - limping. &#34;Just to clarify, the majority of those onboard were perfectly civilised and nice individuals. It was just ruined by a few drunk idiots.&#34; A P&O Cruises spokesman said: &#34;Following an incident on board Britannia on Thursday evening we can confirm that all guests have now disembarked and the matter is now in the hands of the local police.&#34; Hampshire police said: &#34;Officers are in attendance after a number of people were assaulted on-board a cruise ship. &#34;The incident took place during the early hours of Friday, 26 July on-board P&O's Britannia while it was enroute to Southampton from Bergen. &#34;Investigations are ongoing.&#34;"
,
"isAccessibleForFree": "False",
"hasPart": {
"@type": "WebPageElement",
"isAccessibleForFree": "False",
"cssSelector": ".datawallProtected"
}
}
</script>

<section id="content">
<div class="row-a">
<div class="column double">
<article class="w112 "
data-section="worldnews_europe" data-domain="www.independent.ie">
<h1>Passenger 'dressed as clown' sparks 'mass brawl' on cruise ship</h1>
<section class="body " data-sticky-stop>
<div class="p402_hide">
<div class="full">
<div class="w w113" data-widget="FULL SIZE: Independent Slideshow Story Image Article Related" >
<div class="wrap" data-dfpadunitpath="/7380/independent.ie/World_News/Europe" data-dfpadsizes='[[300,250],[300,600],[970,250]]' data-dfpadkeywords='{"pos":["gallery","article_roadblock"]}' data-dfpadtargeting='{"art_id":"38352236"}'>
<figure id="s38352235" rel="lightbox" data-href="https://cdn-02.independent.ie/incoming/article38352235.ece/bec89/BINARY/POLICE%20Cruise%20.jpg" data-alt="A passenger dressed as a clown sparked a mass brawl on a P&O cruise ship, according to reports
Photo credit: @LandoNorrisClub/PA Wire">
<span>
<img src="https://cdn-04.independent.ie/incoming/article38352235.ece/bec89/AUTOCROP/w620/POLICE%20Cruise%20.jpg" alt="A passenger dressed as a clown sparked a mass brawl on a P&O cruise ship, according to reports
Photo credit: @LandoNorrisClub/PA Wire" title="A passenger dressed as a clown sparked a mass brawl on a P&O cruise ship, according to reports
Photo credit: @LandoNorrisClub/PA Wire" width="620" height="658" rel="nofollow"/>
</span>
<figcaption>A passenger dressed as a clown sparked a mass brawl on a P&O cruise ship, according to reports
Photo credit: @LandoNorrisClub/PA Wire</figcaption>
</figure>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="w w140" data-widget="Redesign Article Page tools Widget Gigya sharing">
<div class="wrap">
<div class="meta">
<p>
<strong>Megan Baynes</strong>
</p>
<p>
<time>July 28 2019 11:10 AM</time>
</p>
</div>
<div class="share">
<ul>
<li class="comments" style="display: none;"><a href="#comments" class="comments count">0<span> Comments</span></a></li>
<li>
<div id="share-buttons-30295984" class="share-buttons" data-cid="pagetools" data-sections="1,353,354">
<div class="share-meta share-title">Passenger 'dressed as clown' sparks 'mass brawl' on cruise ship</div>
<div class="share-meta share-subtitle">Independent.ie</div>
<div class="share-meta share-description">A passenger dressed as a clown sparked a mass brawl on a P&O cruise ship, according to reports.</div>
<div class="share-meta share-linkback">https://www.independent.ie/world-news/europe/passenger-dressed-as-clown-sparks-mass-brawl-on-cruise-ship-38352236.html</div>
<div class="share-meta share-image-url">https://www.independent.ie/incoming/article38352235.ece/bec89/AUTOCROP/h342/POLICE%20Cruise%20.jpg</div>
</div>
</li>
<li><a href="mailto:?Subject=Passenger%20%27dressed%20as%20clown%27%20sparks%20%27mass%20brawl%27%20on%20cruise%20ship%20-%20Independent.ie&Body=Passenger%20%27dressed%20as%20clown%27%20sparks%20%27mass%20brawl%27%20on%20cruise%20ship%0A%0AA%20passenger%20dressed%20as%20a%20clown%20sparked%20a%20mass%20brawl%20on%20a%20P%26O%20cruise%20ship%2C%20according%20to%20reports.%0A%0Ahttps%3A%2F%2Fwww.independent.ie%2Fworld-news%2Feurope%2Fpassenger-dressed-as-clown-sparks-mass-brawl-on-cruise-ship-38352236.html" class="icon email"><span>Email</span></a></li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p>
A passenger dressed as a clown sparked a mass brawl on a P&O cruise ship, according to reports.
</p>
</div>
<div class="p402_hide">
<p>Families fled as passengers allegedly used furniture and plates as weapons onboard the ship, which had left Bergen in Norway just 12 hours earlier.</p>
<p>Passengers suspected of being behind the violence were reportedly confined to their cabins on the last day of the cruise, before being greeted by Hampshire police when the ship docked in Southampton on Saturday morning.</p>
<p>Chief correspondent for ITV's Good Morning Britain, Richard Gaisford, was on the cruise.</p>
<p>He wrote on Twitter: "One witness, part of a group involved in the trouble, explained to staff that things kicked off when another passenger appeared dressed as a clown.</p>
<p>"This upset one of their party because they'd specifically booked a cruise with no fancy dress. It led to a violent confrontation."</p>
<p>Staff told Mr Gaisford they had never seen anything like it, and one witness said "there was blood everywhere".</p>
<p>Another passenger said: "I was in my room when the security tannoy happened at 2am.</p>
<p>"I saw two people being escorted out by police - police holding their belongings - limping.</p>
<p>"Just to clarify, the majority of those onboard were perfectly civilised and nice individuals. It was just ruined by a few drunk idiots."</p>
<p>A P&O Cruises spokesman said: "Following an incident on board Britannia on Thursday evening we can confirm that all guests have now disembarked and the matter is now in the hands of the local police."</p>
<!-- RW: 35715869 k: reference-default-35715869-sec-worldnews_europe-art e: 20m d: -->
<script id="bb-outstream-37199872">
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
if (!document.querySelectorAll('.widget.video.vms').length) {
var s = document.createElement('script');
s.type = 'text/javascript';
s.async = true;
s.src = 'https://independent.mainroll.com/a/independent_floating_outstream.js?dfp_adunit_l1=InArticleVideo&dfp_adunit_l2=World_News&dfp_adunit_l3=Europe&dart_articleId=36948112&dart_art_ID=36948112&dart_kw=%5B%22Obese%22%2C%22workers%22%2C%22should%22%2C%22start%22%2C%22later%22%5D&dart_gs_channels=%5B%22gs_notprocessed%22%5D&section=worldnews_europe';
document.getElementById('bb-outstream-37199872').parentElement.appendChild(s);
}
});
</script>
<style type="text/css">
#bb-iawr-inarticle- { clear: both; margin: 0 0 15px; }
</style>
<p>Hampshire police said: "Officers are in attendance after a number of people were assaulted on-board a cruise ship.</p>
<p>"The incident took place during the early hours of Friday, 26 July on-board P&O's Britannia while it was enroute to Southampton from Bergen.</p>
<p>"Investigations are ongoing."</p>
<!-- RW: 35054162 k: reference-default-35054162-sec-worldnews_europe-art e: 0m d: -->

</script>
</div>
<p class="originalSource">
PA Media
</p>
</div>

</section>

<h2>

</span>
</h2>

<h3 class="hx">Boris Johnson snubs Leo Varadkar as UK 'ups ante' on stand-off over Brexit backstop
&nbsp;<span class="flag-c bx-a business">Brexit</span>
</h3>
</a>
</article>
<article class="small">
<a href="https://www.independent.ie/opinion/comment/eoghan-harris-boris-johnson-has-called-leo-and-simons-backstop-bluff-38351866.html">
<figure class="right">
<span class="img-a">

</span>
</figure>

<ul>
<li><strong>Follow</strong>
<ul>
<li class="facebook"><a href="https://www.facebook.com/Independent.ie" target="_blank"><span>Facebook</span></a></li>

</ul>
</li>
<li><strong>Contact</strong>
<ul>
<li class="email" style=""><a href="mailto:info@independent.ie?body=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.independent.ie%2Fworld-news%2Feurope%2Fstepbrother-is-found-guilty-of-horrific-murder-of-becky-16-34193239.html%0D%0A%0D%0AThe%20stepbrother%20of%20Becky%20Watts%20has%20been%20found%20guilty%20of%20murdering%20and%20dismembering%20the%20Bristol%20teenager%20following%20a%20botched%20kidnap%20attempt%20motivated%20by%20a%20sadistic%20sexual%20fantasy.%0D%0A%0D%0A&subject=Stepbrother%20is%20found%20guilty%20of%20horrific%20murder%20of%20Becky%20%2816%29%20-%20independent"><span>Email</span></a></li>

<script type='text/javascript'>
var getCookie = function(key) {
var cookies = document.cookie.split('; ');
for (var i = 0, parts; (parts = cookies[i] && cookies[i].split('=')); i++) {
if (parts.shift() === key) {
var cookieValue = parts.join('=');
if (cookieValue) cookieValue = decodeURIComponent(cookieValue);
return cookieValue;
}
}
};
var _sf_async_config={};
/** CONFIGURATION START **/
_sf_async_config.uid = 51545;
_sf_async_config.domain = 'independent.ie';
_sf_async_config.autoDetect = false;
_sf_async_config.path = "/world-news/europe/article-38352236.html";
_sf_async_config.sections = "News,News_World News,News_World News_Europe";
_sf_async_config.authors = "Megan Baynes";
var _cbq = window._cbq = (window._cbq || []);
_cbq.push(['_acct', getCookie('guid') ? 'lgdin' : 'anon']);
/** CONFIGURATION END **/
(function() {
var e = document.createElement('script');
e.type = 'text/javascript';
e.async = true;
e.src = 'https://cdn-02.independent.ie/static/cccbc2e4c9d1bfe70876dd285234a874b135feb4/js/bluebillywig-chartbeat.min.js';
document.body.appendChild(e);
})();
</script>
